summary: An email from an FBI Victim Services Coordinator to an FBI recipient, referencing a prior Epstein briefing and requesting an urgent call. The sender identifies as a handler and friend of someone, and the message is marked as confidential.

persons.name: LSW
persons.role: Victim Services Coordinator, Crisis Response Canine Handler
persons.context: The sender of the email, who works in the FBI Victim Services Division, Terrorism and Special Jurisdiction Unit, and is requesting an urgent call regarding an unspecified matter, referencing a prior Epstein briefing.

events.title: Epstein briefing
events.description: A briefing related to Jeffrey Epstein that the email sender and recipient both previously attended.

keyFacts: An FBI Victim Services Coordinator sent an urgent email in January 2020 referencing a prior Epstein briefing.
The sender, LSW, identifies as a 'handler' and friend of an unnamed individual.
The email is marked with a strict FBI confidentiality notice regarding Personally Identifiable Information (PII).
